mapper.select: select * from tbl_board order by board_no desc
mapper.update: update tbl_board set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1, last_update_date = sysdate where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(board_no, title, content, writer) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{content},#{writer})
